short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to organize WebKit WebExposed bugs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WebExposed Chrome extension allows users to prioritize and annotate WebKit bugs labeled with the "WebExposed" keyword. 

Source: https://github.com/maxh/webexposed-extension/tree/master/client
